title: Did a Woman Cancel Her Wedding Because Guests Refused to Pay $1,500 Each to Attend?
subtitle: Purported screenshots of a Facebook rant by an unhappy ex-bride prompted a global wave of curiosity and schadenfreude in August 2018.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: A woman named Susan posted an angry tirade blaming the cancellation of her wedding on her guests' refusal to contribute $1,500 each towards it.
